review_text: They were very responsive. There was an error at checkin & once we brought it to their attention they took care of it immediately.
Nice rooms, quiet and comfortable. Wonderful common areas and deck to enjoy the view! Delicious breakfast! Will definitely stay again!
Great accommodations! The breakfast was a great way to start the day. The regular business of the winery did not disturb us at all.
Great stay and the staff was very welcoming! Will stay here next time I travel to Vermilion!

We had a wonderful stay at Valiant. We enjoyed time on the deck drinking wine and playing cards. It was very quiet at night and the breakfast was delicious. We would definitely chose to stay here again.

We had a great stay in Vermillion! Our hosts at Valiant were super kind and flexible, even though we had a last-minute change to our booking. Tasting their wines and spirits was another fun experience.. you have to try their Bourbon:)
Very friendly staff and kind,Highly recommend for a stay :)
Our second stay here. It’s clean and peaceful, welcoming and hospitable. The breakfast is a nice addition. Thank you.
Super! It was chance that we stayed here in winter but what a magical time of year. Everything is spot on, great place to stay and the staff, wine and breakfast is superb Cant go wrong
We always enjoy staying at Valiant! My only issue is getting up two flights of ice covered metal stairs to get in. But it was Christmas so I didn’t expect people to be around to help.
It's great to stay where you get treated like a long lost friend and spoiled from start to finish. Super friendly staff, great breakfast and location! We can't wait to find back!
We had a very comfortable stay. The space was very clean and the whole staff was amazing, especially Adrienne! She was very welcoming.
The hosts were very welcoming, and the balcony was beautiful!
Comfy beds and nice location!
Nice place, very clean and great breakfast

Beautiful location and a nice big room! We were warmly welcomed with a glass of wine and some ideas about how to spend our evening downtown. Breakfast was yummy and right on time! It was a great girls night out....we will be back!
Beautiful peaceful setting. Love the deck with the overlook.
Was great! Loved the outside space. Beautiful views.
Great place to stay. Its located in a nice quiet area off the beaten path with a great view.
A beautiful setting. Our favorite spot was the balcony playing games, enjoying the wildlife, and sunset. We also had a delicious breakfast!!! We would stay again 🙂
A nice, quiet and safe place to spend the night.
fantastic place for our weekend getaway!
Nice room, good breakfast, and complimentary wine tasting
Valiant was a fantastic place to stay in Vermilion. Good location with pretty views. Very friendly staff, very clean rooms and great value.
Convenient location for visiting both Vermillion and Yankton.
Rooms are clean, beds are comfortable but the decor is very outdated. The good was fine but not what we have experienced at other bed and breakfast.
Valiant is great! Both hosts were so nice and sweet!

This is an amazing place to stay! Comfortable! Peaceful! Beautiful! Clean! Great breakfast! Kind and helpful folks own and operate this wonderful bed and breakfast! I highly recommend it and will definitely return when in Vermillion!

Thanks to Sherry and Adrienne for making our stay enjoyable while we visited family in Vermillion for the first time since the pandemic. We really liked our Bloody Mary Sunday at the Winery. We had never heard of it before, and it was very tasty. We did the wine tasting on the second floor deck with a great view. Breakfasts were hearty and wonderfully prepared! We were in the Buffalo room, which was clean and comfortable. Definitely would stay again, if we are back in town.
It was a great stay. love it!!! highly recommend!
The best accommodations and a special place to visit. Adrienne was warm and welcoming and provided excellent service at check in and dining. Rooms are roomy. Will definitely stay again.
Quiet and cozy. Lots of character. Close to downtown Vermillion with lots of great eateries.

This is a very comfortable hotel like room. Our after hours check in was convenient, no contact, and fast.
The homemade breakfast was made fresh at the time we requested and was mouth wateringly delicious.
We had an excellent stay and would definitely return.
We enjoyed the wine tastings as well.
Great location and sparkling clean rooms. Tasting room is very cool, but only open Thursday through Sunday.
Great B&B with wine tasting included. A real treat in the fall is sitting out on the back porch in the golden leaf canopy tasting the vineyard's offerings.

Valiant is a friendly place to stay. Adrian was very pleasant and was able to help you with anything you needed. The room as lovely and very clean! The shared kitchen and balcony was an added convenience. Breakfast in the morning as delicious and relaxing. We would definitely go back if we are in the area again.
Comfortable, feels private, breakfast is good & good host
Beautiful views. Quiet space. Nice clean room with great amenities. Friendly staff and love the wine/whiskey tasting!

We had a quiet stay at the B&B.. Though we arrived after 5pm, there were two glasses of wine waiting for us since the tasting hours were over. We really enjoyed sitting out on the deck later in the evening, it was a perfect night for it! Our host provided info on local running trails and the breakfast was great! Plenty of tables were available to ensure social distancing was possible. Everything was clean. My only critique was that the shower could have had a better head or pressure, or something - it was fine, but not great for washing my thick hair.
Amazing view and even better breakfast!

Our first time using AirBNB and was pleasantly surprised with the experience. Valiant's was the quietest place I have ever stayed. Breakfast each morning was delicious and ready when we came downstairs. I would definitely stay here again when in Vermillion.
Nice place, convenient locations for us. Breakfast was good.
An adorable place with a cute atmosphere, kind people, great wine, and delicious breakfast!
Good value - a very nice place at a reasonable price. Fine view of the bluffs. Room was spacious and nicely decorated. The wine tasting is a nice touch as well. Plus warm cookies at bedtime !
This was a great find for my wife and I. Wonderful staff and accommodations. Such a nice option when you visit a college town.

My husband and I had the pleasure of staying at Darren’s place Memorial Day weekend. It was just what the Dr ordered. We spent three days listening to nature and watching the river run by. He has a beautiful spot and Darren is very responsive, doing everything he can to be sure guests are comfortable.

We had the MOST wonderful time at The River @ Newcastle and we’re so pleased to have met Darren. He has an exceptionally beautiful spot, was so responsive and accommodating, and his place was so well appointed. He was such a pleasure to speak with and we had the best time camping, fishing, looking at the stars, and spending time with family. Could NOT have been any better. Will 100% stay again. Thank you, Darren!

Beautiful view of the river and bridge from the nice deck. Camper was ok and adequate for what we needed. Driveway is steep, so 4x4 vehicle is almost a necessity, especially after a rain. Darren is a great host!
Beautiful setting right on the river. Clean RV. Lots to do around the area but also very peaceful to just hang out at the RV. Wish we had brought our fishing poles!
This was such a fun stay with beautiful views!! Darren was so helpful and informative and made sure we had everything we needed for the weekend. Definitely recommend!

From the momentof booking, Darren was attentive and took action for any of my concerns. He went out of his way to make me feel comfortable. The property was so beautiful with the river view and pristine 5th wheel and it was obvious at how much work he had been trying to improve it. I would call him a SUPER Super Host. His property manager was on top of a plumbing issue and it was taken care of within the hour they were notified. I couldn't have asked for a nicer, peaceful place to stay for 10 days.
Beautiful area! Darren was very responsive and answered all of my questions. Very friendly host.
UNBELIEVABLE!! The lodging, the views and the hospitality were absolutely unrivalled😊. Our family can't thank Darren enough for making our weekend getaway perfect!
What a beautiful place on the river. Darren made sure we knew where everything was and had what we needed. The outdoor kitchen with the best view was the highlight!
Darren was an exceptional host and his place was exactly as described. The private dock and views were incredible. We cannot wait to return for our next visit!

We couldn't have found a better place for our vacation than the River at Newcastle! It had everything we were looking for and more: total privacy, spectacular river views, clean and comfortable accommodations, and a huge deck complete with outdoor kitchen. Best of all was Darren - he is the ultimate host, without exception! He is so welcoming, helpful, and cheerful and made us feel right at home. Thank you, Darren for the River and Newcastle. It's beyond five stars - we will be back!
Very clean sorroundings and has everything you will need.Host is very friendly!
We had an absolute blast here! The camper was very comfortable for our family of 4 and the view of the river was breathtaking. Darren was an extremely gracious host. We’ll definitely be back! 🖤💙🖤

This was incredible weekend for all of us! I speak for everyone, we absolutely loved this camp on the river!
Highly recommend this place to anyone that enjoys a secluded place with water right next to it. I don’t have anything bad to say about this place.
Darren was an amazing host, he got back to me within minutes with any questions I had, and was just an amazing host overall. I can’t say enough good things about this place. Definitely will be coming back.
The view was awesome! Peaceful! Darren was a great host. Made sure everything was taken care of.

Our stay at The River was nothing short of amazing. The 5th wheel was very clean & comfortable. The deck was massive and was situated just right to have an unobstructed view of the river - we were even able to set up Darren’s tent & air mattress for our kids to have an outdoor camping experience. Not to mention, the Blackstone grill was a huge perk! The dock was also a huge plus - our kids enjoyed some time with their fishing poles out there and had a blast. Darren provided a wonderful & quiet little getaway, and his communication was unmatched.

Peaceful retreat, quiet and safe. The place is in a beautiful location with a great view of the Missouri River. My family loves the location, and my kids had a great time fishing on the dock.
Darren was extremely helpful throughout our stay. We can't wait to come back.

Peaceful retreat, clean , quiet and safe. Exceeded description. Globetrotter recharging my batteries…beautiful location and place for that. Plenty of places, activities and food within a reasonable drive. Really enjoyed hearing the birds and watching the fish jump while on the dock.
Paddle boarding, kayaking at a small lake without any power watercraft at Lake Yankton was a blast. Picked up South Dakota’s best pizza and enjoyed it immensely on the new deck.
Huge selection of trails…hiking, biking and walking.
Darren was extremely helpful throughout our time booking all the way through check-out, it was the perfect weekend getaway to disconnect and recharge in a beautiful location! Can’t wait to comeback!

This was a lovely oasis ~ unexpected, and above and beyond, from the furnishings (cozy, well decorated, special touches), to the home cooked breakfast delivered to our door. Even the books were well curated (I did not even know Alice Walker wrote a book about raising chickens until I saw it in your collection). Many thanks!

If you could mix time travel with hospitality, you may be nearby. Add in genuine warmth and a connection to the land and a sprinkle of cooking your grandma used to make, and you are now at kate's. Thanks for the lasting inspiration.

Kate’s Cottage is truly a hidden gem. We always love our time there! It’s so beautiful, quaint & peaceful. Gale is such a wonderful host. Each of her little touches is done with so much thought & love. Her breakfasts are delicious too. Can’t wait to stay again!
Gale was so warm and friendly and the Cottage couldn't have been more adorable.

This is our third visit with Gale. We have previously stayed at her place, during Christmas and New Year’s. And she had decorated them to create the winter wonderland at that time!
This time, we went in spring, with our little son. And it was a perfect weekend get away.
The place is as always very clean, neat, comfortable, cozy. She even had board books out for our baby!! Even though it was raining, and she had prior engagements, she came specially to show the goats to us. And her breakfast is always was delicious.
She’s an amazing host. Very responsive.
You don’t need to think twice before booking this place!

Nice country cottage in a quiet peaceful setting. Gale served a made from scratch breakfast that was delicious. Enjoyed seeing goats, chickens and Flo the black lab on the property, but watch out for Batcat, the not so friendly black cat.

Staying at kate’s cottage never disappoints, it’s beautiful, cozy and so so peaceful, Gale is absolutely amazing and the breakfast is so delicious. Being surrounded by nature and the calmness of the farm is the best way to spend a gateway. As always we loved to come back.
Gale is a phenomenal host and the cottage is absolutely perfect! We love our unplugged time at the cottage!!

Gale's place is beautiful, quiet and peaceful - that much is obvious. But she didn't have to provide a delicious homeade breakfast, seasonally decorate, provide high quality linens, towels and a robe, light a candle and turn the lights low upon my arrival, provide snacks and cream/honey to go with my tea or any of the other little touches...yet, she did. This place was like going home to my Mama's- and I'm blessed with the BEST one. ♡ Thank you, Gale.
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the cottage. It was a cozy getaway before our long haul home. Gale was a lovely host, and her breakfast was delicious!

Such a sweet cottage and Gale couldn’t have been more helpful and accommodating! Our 9-month old loved the animals. Gale recommend Kava Rose for dinner and we loved it. Just a lovely stay overall. Thank you Gale!
this was an amazing beautiful cabin. I truly wish I could have stayed for much longer. truly set a new standard for airbnbs!

We loved our stay at Kate’s Cottage. It was homey and comfortable and Gale is an excellent host. She was very responsive and friendly, and the breakfast she prepared for us was amazing! I would highly recommend staying here.

Gale’s is never a disappointment. 2nd time here and we were blown away by the comfort of the bed. And of course the breakfast and the details she has put in make this a home away from home.
We will keep returning when traveling in this part of the world. 10 stars

If I could give this place 100 stars I would! Gale could not be better a host! The cottage is immaculate and feels like home the second you pull in the driveway. Upon arrival we were greeted by the chickens, kitty and even the goats came out to say hello. All the little extras far surpassed any expectations I’ve ever had of an airbnb host!
The included breakfast was delicious topped with a cherry on top of a handwritten note by the host and baked goodies!
We will be back!

Kate's Cottage came recommended to us when our original stay changed. We were able to make a last minute reservation with Gale when we saw the cottage was open for our time in the area. We have stayed at lots of airbnb's and VRBO'S in the U.S. and one in Paris. This stay was by far our FAVORITE and it is because of Gale's ability to go above and beyond with every little detail. The cottage and property are delightful and so comfortable feeling. The beds are amazing and the surroundings so quiet. Gale adds the extra touches such as homemade breakfast, bread, chocolate chip cookies, coffee, cocoa to tie everything together in a beautiful bow. We cannot wait to book our next stay at Kate's Cottage!! Thank you again for everything!
We had a great time at this spot! Secluded and quiet and a perfect place to rest for the night. Gale is a great communicator and makes a great breakfast!
A great place for a quiet, unplugged stay! We worked on vision and goals for the next year and it was the perfect stay! Breakfast - delicious as always and Gale is such a great host!!!
If I could give Katie’s Cottage 10 stars I would. Such a cute place; all the details in decorating. Clean, cozy; and breakfast both mornings pushed it over the top! Exactly as pictured and described.

Gale was the most amazing host ever. The cottage was perfect for us while we waited for our apartment to be ready. The breakfast each day was phenomenal and I wish we could live there permanently! I can’t wait to go back to Kate’s cottage.
I had a great stay. Adorable spot to rest for the night.
We loved our stay at Kate’s Cottage. It was a cozy weekend trip to rest up and enjoy time with family!
We love Kate's Cottage and will continue to go back. It's such a peaceful oasis. Gale is the absolute BEST HOSTESS!! Thank you for all of the accommodations and amazing food, amenities, and care.

I am from St. Louis and lived in North Dakota, so Gale‘s spot was a good halfway point. We’ve been coming here for over half a decade and it is honestly something we look forward to every time we make the drive. Not only is her place ridiculously inexpensive for what you get, she is an awesome person, great hostess But genuinely a good human being. The first time we went there it was like a home away from home. She remembers my kids names and is the most sincere person you will ever meet. I cannot recommend this place enough. It has been nothing but great memories, good vibes, And a feeling of your home away from home. This place is a national treasure.

I figured it would be difficult for Gale and her cottage to exceed expectations based on her reviews, considering we knew it was going to be amazing. But Gale did it. Gale obviously loves to host her guests and makes the experience unique and unforgettable. My family loved our stay and will be back. Thanks Gale!
Such a cute little cottage. Gale goes above and beyond for her guests

There are not enough words to describe this wonderful little slice of heaven. The cottage itself was beautiful and full of surprises. I had everything I needed and more. The breakfast Gale made was beyond amazing and the little touches were just so adorable. I felt so spoiled. Especially since I booked late and Gale still asked if I wanted some cookies when she came to feed the goats!!! The cookies were warm and freshly baked and just a nice little hug before bed!
Meeting Gale and Flo were my highlights. Gale is such a nice upbeat wonderful person and you can tell they put a lot of work into this Beauty! And flo was so loving and sweet! What a good watchdog! This was my favorite place I’ve ever stayed through air bnb!!!

Ever been somewhere and it was BETTER than the pictures and description? That is Gale’s Place! So relaxing and peaceful and just beautiful! Gale is such amazing woman and her attention to detail to making you feel at home is felt from the moment you reach out to inquire. The homemade breakfast was just delicious and such a wonderful treat. The beauty that surrounds the cottage is breathtaking (makes a wonderful sunrise coffee walk)! Extremely personalized stay and incredibly cozy. Finn makes a great surprise in the morning and comes to say hello. We were passing through and were incredibly lucky to have found this gorgeous gem. Do yourself a favor and go ahead and book, you’ll thank me later and forever want to come back. Thank you Gale for everything, it was just perfect and we felt so loved staying at your cottage on the farm ❤️

This is one of the cutest cottages ever. You have to see it!
I could have stayed here and never left. This truly feels like a home away from home. It is so well maintained and decorated. You can tell that there is a very caring and loving couple behind the scenes of this place. And someone with an eye for home decor.
The breakfast delivery in the morning is a bonus and such a sweet start to the day. We spent a night in the early winter here and it was beautiful but we can imagine this place being even more magical in the summer.
We highly recommend this place to everyone who travels by here!
If you like great breakfast’s and hospitality, cute little cabin in the country side of South Dakota then this is a wonderful place to be!
We have now been to Kate's Cottage several times, and love everything about it. Thanks, Gale, for such a wonderful place to stay!
Great little get away in the country. Breakfast was a big hit!
The cottage was cozy and Gale’s hosting skills surpassed any other place we have stayed. Highly recommend it for a quiet stay.

Kate’s Cottage is the reason you stay with an air bnb rather than a hotel. A unique and homey space, surrounded by beautiful farm country, with unmatched hospitality from the host. If you are visiting Sioux Falls, Kate’s cottage is worth the short drive. One of our favorite stays ever.
Kate's cottage is very beautiful! The cottage is exquisitely decorated for fall and the breakfast and snacks are delicious. Gale is extremely welcoming! Highly recommend.
The offering is beyond the best! We so loved the little farm cottage and it’s authentic charm. The location is amazingly beautiful. Both of us wished we could stay longer.

Kate's Cottage is simply delightful! Book now and thank me later :) Gale has created an adorable, comfortable, safe, and cozy spot perfect for your trip through SD. Breakfast was delectable, Flo was welcoming
..but it all works because of Gale, the consummate host.

The little cottage was clean and nice. The bed was sooo comfortable! The location is very peaceful and quiet. Gale prepared a delicious breakfast for us in the morning! We would definitely recommend a stay here if in the area!

Kate's Cottage is an amazing respite with amazing hosts.
Gale provides an actual breakfast that arrives hot and ready to eat. She's amazingly generous and what a wonderful bonus for your stay!

Cute, very clean cottage that was peaceful and the perfect size for my husband and me and our 10 month old. Gale reached out to coordinate details of our stay and had so many nice touches in place including the perfect light breakfast before our early morning departure. We wish our stay hadn’t been so quick and hope to stay again when we travel to Vermillion!

Kate's Cottage is such a beautiful respite in South Dakota!
This is an Airbnb we enjoy and return to because we enjoy it that much.
Be careful; Gale will cook and deliver a delicious breakfast for your visit the following morning. Why careful? It's so delicious and filling that you might be tempted to take a little snooze afterwards before your departure.
Lovely place and a well deserved 5 star rating.
Gale is a fantastic, thoughtful host. The cottage is immaculate, and the surroundings are very peaceful. Gale also makes really yummy cookies!!!
Breakfast was amazing and the cottage is beautiful!

If you have the opportunity to stay at Kate’s Cottage, you will be so grateful you did. It really is something special. Neat as a pin, beautiful and peaceful surroundings and felt more like home than any place I’ve ever stayed.
Gale was such a sweet hostess and was always available. Breakfasts were such a special treat.
I can’t say enough about how sweet and special this place is.

Gale was friendly and helpful. Her cottage was everything we expected and more.
Her breakfast was amazing!
We will definitely be back!

Kate’s Cottage was charming, comfortable, peaceful, and cozy. Gale has done a remarkable job in her efforts to restore the building into a lovely spot. Her communications with us were succinct and clear. . All amenities were readily available. The furnishings were lovely and the bed was exceptionally comfortable. Gale’s breakfast was wonderful!! We loved our stay and found her spot superb in every way possible. Her guests will be pleasantly surprised upon arrival at how nice she is and how lovely her cottage is.
Gale was a great hostess! Very accommodating with late arrival. Very quiet and peaceful!

Best Airbnb gem! Such a peaceful and unplugged retreat. We love Kate’s Cottage and Gale is simply the best host!! Breakfast is amazing, also. Gale was so sweet to help us with some forgotten items too- a toothbrush and also a ball/mitt for us to play catch (our 8 year old was so happy, after he forgot his at home and Gale came to the rescue!). We played in the yard, did puzzles, fed the goats and enjoyed our time as a fam! Thank you Gale for this sweet retreat!!!

Beautiful, relaxing, peaceful…lovely home. We were there for a short night and up early and back on the road. Gale is wonderful. She usually prepares a breakfast for you but since we were leaving extra early she spent her evening baking scones for us. She brought scones, orange juice and fruit so that we would have something in the morning. We highly recommend Kate’s Cottage!

Our favorite Airbnb! We choose to stay here each time we pass through. Gale is a gracious, thoughtful and caring host. She is incredible. Beautiful private setting and the cutest cottage we’ve ever stayed. We look forward to visiting each time. The breakfast is absolutely first rate. Cannot say too many good things about Gale and the cottage.
A wonderful stay! Gale was such an amazing host. Our only complaint is that we only got to spend two nights there. Will absolutely be back! Thank you for an amazing trip!
A

Gale responded quickly while we were on the road and was able to accommodate us with only hours notice. There were so many welcoming, thoughtful touches- we feel blessed to have stopped and experienced the farm on our travels. It was such a serene and peaceful stay. We will be making this an annual stop as long as the cottage, and Gale- are still around! 👌

Kate’s cottage was the perfect stay for our cross country trip! Gale allowed us to let our dogs off leash and run free which they appreciated very much after being in a car for 8 hours that day. It was so peaceful & clean, I loved staying here!
We had an amazing time at Kates cottage, it was beautiful and peaceful, gales breakfast was delicious. Would love to come back.

Would recommend this place to anyone. From the homemade cookies waiting for us and breakfast delivered in the morning this place is nothing short of amazing. So peaceful and private yet within a short drive of lots to do. We definitely plan on coming back!!

I think it would be hard to build on what others have already said about Gale’s wonderful place at Kate’s Cottage. It is such a beautiful & tranquil spot just away from the hustle and bustle of interstate travel but far enough that you could be staying on any secluded country property. We wished we had more days there and will be looking forward to being able to plan another, longer trip there in the near future. Highly recommend!
One of the best places I’ve stayed! I loved the location and history of the home. Very comfortable, clean and peaceful. I would definitely visit again!

Gale's little cottage is a lovely place! It was charming, clean, and in a quiet country setting. Lots of thoughtful little touches that show she cares for her guests. And a delicious homemade breakfast delivered to our door was the cherry on top. We would highly recommend this place to anyone traveling through the area!

If you’re looking for an unplugged, peaceful escape into farm country, Kate’s Cottage is for you. Rich in tradition and history, the small house is lovely and comfortable. Gale provides a beautiful breakfast delivered to your door and she is also very responsive before and during your stay. She and her pets are most friendly but also respectful of your privacy and seclusion. Nearby small towns provide local fare. If Beresford area is on your route, or even if it’s out of your way, this is a gem.

Amazing! Our stay at Kate’s Cottage was wonderful. Gale is an outstanding host and makes you feel right at home. She leaves you a great breakfast in the morning, such a personal touch. It was the best AirBnB we have ever stayed in. If we are ever back in the area we will defiantly stay again!

Kate's Cottage was great! Having a cup of coffee on the porch in the morning was really peaceful. Gale was a tremendous host and the breakfast was delicious. The goats, Flo and Batcat were all entertaining and made us smile. We definitely recommend staying at Kate's Cottage.

Gale's property is absolutely beautiful and peaceful. my husband and I truly felt welcomed and at home. Gale went above and beyond, making us a wonderful homecooked meal with fresh berries the morning we left. We definitely will be back one day!!

We enjoyed the quiet little cottage, it was more than we expected. She delivered our wonderful breakfast at our door every morning, the cottage was very clean and had lots of character. We plan to stay again when back in this area, and will encourage people to stay at Kates Cottage.
Jeff and Mindy Lems
Springfield, Mo.

This was our second time staying at Kate's Cottage. It is very quiet and peaceful. We enjoyed going for a long walk down the road without a single vehicle passing us. The cottage is very neat and clean, and breakfast was absolutely delicious. We can't recommend Kate's Cottage enough!

My husband and I stopped at Kate’s Cottage as our first stop on our long cross country journey—we were honestly blown away by our experience. The instructions were easy to follow, the cottage was just as described, but most of all Gale was the most amazing host. The cottage was so cozy and it was the perfect place to rest after a long drive. She prepared the most delicious breakfast that was far more than we expected. It was exactly what we needed to start a long day of driving. We wish we could have stayed longer!!
It was the perfect chill honeymoon place💕

This may be one of our favorite Airbnb's we've stayed at. The cottage is so charming and well decorated - the property is beautiful and peaceful - the animals were fun to interact with - we loved this place! However the best part of this Airbnb is the host, Gale. We were greeted by delicious cookies and had breakfast delivered at whatever time we requested each morning (AND she cooked all items gluten free when I notified her that I had celiac disease!) Their home is on the property but we felt we had great privacy and the space to ourselves. It was the getaway we needed to unplug and our dog to have space to play.
Great place. Very quiet and kind of secluded. Gale was a great host. House was exactly as described. Communication was great

Most beautiful Airbnb I’ve ever stayed at! I appreciate Gale so much for her handwritten kind notes, the delicious and adorable freshly cooked breakfast in the morning, and so many extra sweet touches that made this place a pure joy! I would definitely come back and highly recommend to my friends to visit! The cottage is even more adorable than the photos in person!

Gale was a most gracious host. Friendly, helpful & accessible but not intrusive.
Breakfast was delicious and way beyond our expectations.
We wished we stayed longer.

This is my family’s 4th stay at Kate’s cottage and as always, is amazing. The property is quiet, private & serene. The cottage itself is immaculate, comforting, home-like feel and way too good of a deal for why you are paying for. Did I mention she cooks you a home cooked breakfast and leaves it at your doorstep l? Kate’s cottage is a favorite of my family’s and we will be sure to visit again.
Probably our favorite Airbnb! Gale is so hospitable and the cottage is just lovely. We hope to return!
Exactly what the description says. Awesome cottage and Gale is an incredible host. Would love to stay here again in the future!

Gale was a wonderful host. Her cottage was comfortable and clean with a surprising amount of amenities for the price. She has a lovely farm with a cool back story that is interesting to read about in a binder. She had cookies on the counter and made a wonderful breakfast. Her small farm is perfect if you're looking to get away from the city and don't care about not having internet or tv, which I wanted to get away from.

Awesome place to stay. Relaxing and peaceful. Delicious breakfast. Loved the welcome greeting from Flo the dog. Look forward to staying there again when we’re in the area. This was our first AirBNB experience and Gale has set the bar high. Could not have had a better stay and perfect for what we needed after a long day on the road.

We enjoyed our stay in the cottage! The location is great, it is private, peaceful and a great distance from the city of Sioux Falls. The bed was super comfortable and we enjoyed the breakfast the following morning!

I cannot recommend Gale’s cottage enough!
The location was so serene and peaceful - like a cozy little oasis away from all of the hustle and bustle. Gale was a kind and responsive host, but was also very respectful of privacy, and her cooking was amazing!
As a solo female traveler, I felt completely safe at the cottage and in the surrounding towns, and would highly recommend to all!

A lovely and quite secluded spot - Gale has managed to cram quite a lot of useful stuff, both decorative and functional, into a relatively small space - felt quite at home very quickly! The surrounding countryside is beautiful, peaceful and quiet. Really enjoyed our stay.

From the moment you drive up to Kate’s Cottage you feel a sense of serenity. The cottage provided us a calm resting place in a move across country. We were able to sit on the front porch feeling the breeze gently brush our face as we chatted about the rest of our journey. There was ample space for our dog to walk and stretch. The breakfast delivered right to the Cottage was delivered and very much appreciated.

Gale's beautiful farm was exactly what we needed for a weekend getaway. The land was both private but somehow alive, the animals loved our puppy, and we got some much needed rest and refreshment. The reviews citing Gale's cooking CANNOT be overstated, we were never once wanting. Charming, fun, and above all else, Gale did everything possible to make it feel like home.

Gale's place was absolutely perfect. It's an ideal getaway: a cute cottage surrounded by friendly goats, cats, and the world's sweetest, happiest dog. The breakfast every morning is delicious and homemade (and honestly, enough to cover lunch as well). Would definitely stay there again.
Gale was an awesome host. Our stay was peaceful and relaxing. The breakfast and treats were great! We would definitely stay again when we're in the area.

We were so happy to return to Gale's wonderful cottage- it was a bit like coming home. Wonderful breakfasts, gracious and flexible host, and charming setting. It was good to see you again Gale, and we hope to be back in the fall.
Gale is a great host. The area is quiet and peaceful. Breakfast was delicious way way above and beyond what we expected. She makes it feel like home.
Awesome stay. Great cottage and gale provided a lovely breakfast. Would recommend for a nice retreat!

I was so curious to how gale had 575 satisfied customers with 5 stars. I honestly now know. She brought us the most delicious breakfast everyday of our stay. Her cooking was unbelievable. We had a great time with the cats they were so funny. The special notes throughout the house uplifting, warm , and funny. Kates place felt just like home. Truly one of a kind host I can’t tell you enough . You have to experience this if ever in the area.
The cottage was a relaxing getaway for the weekend.

I wish I could have stayed longer. It’s the most wonderful place. I highly recommend staying here and bring spoiled by Gale. Her son Alex is also an incredible person and creative spirit. He invited me to see his shop and work. Impressive. The entire family worked to renovate this cottage. It’s perfection.

We had a great stay at Gale’s cottage.
It has lovely charm!
Gale is very responsive and helped us get in without any problems. Our pups were very happy to be able to have the space to stretch their legs.
We got the best chocolate chip cookies and an amazing breakfast to start our long day driving off right :)
Would definitely recommend!

Exactly as described. Very kind , responsive ,hospitable hosts that go the extra mile and it just kinda reminded me of how we as people are supposed to treat each other . She reminded me by making cookies and a delicious breakfast for me . Offered to let me use there lab top if i wanted to watch movies. And by giving me the option to come into the home they live in if i wanted or needed internet. They didnt have to offer or do any of those things but it sure was nice! people forget we are all gods children and are here in this together and we should always be kind to one another. Thanks Gale for an awesome stay!!!
Gale is an excellent host who has put so much thought and care into every detail of her guests' experience. We would stay here again in a heartbeat!

Gale was a great host. She left us with scrumptious cookies, kind notes, and delicious breakfasts which were ready for our time of choice. She has goats and chickens on the property but we couldn't see them this time of the year due to all of the wind and snow. She was nice enough to let our 3 dogs stay with us at no extra charge and they played with Flo. The home was cozy and vastly decorated, if you want to learn the history of the Gale's forefathers, there is a book on the chest in the living room. We hope to stop by when the weather is better. We highly recommend staying here to get that farm and country feel.

We had another delightful stay at Gale’s place! It’s a hidden gem. So quaint, cozy & relaxing. The perfect getaway. We enjoyed a beautiful winter sunset & sunrise. And Gale also treated us to a delicious breakfast in the morning. It was perfect. Can’t wait to come back again!!

We love Kate’s Cottage! Simply the best and one of our favorites!! Unplugged and cozy, Gale had the cottage all ready for us to stay just before Christmas! It was decorated so adorable and she had Christmas treats out! She also made sure we’d be warm enough (we stayed on a night with -10 degree weather not including wind. I’m here to report that we were warm - almost hot!) It was great in the attic also. Gale was so great to check on us to make sure as the kids were upstairs. The new attic section is adorable and was perfect for our two kids. Breakfast was also amazing. We had such a nice time just reading, playing games and doing puzzles. Thank you Gale!

Gale was very responsive and asked when we wanted breakfast and if we had any dietary restrictions but I was unable to stay at Gales due to whiteout blizzard conditions. Gale was very responsive as the weather conditions were changing quickly but told me not to worry and that she would refund me.
If I am able to stay when the conditions are better, I would gladly do so. You can really tell that she is a great host and even better person
Our third stay… and we’ll keep coming back! The perfect retreat for us from busy city lives. Gale’s hospitality and the peaceful location are incredible, every single time!!

We are on our way down south for the holidays and had stayed here for one night. I honestly wish we could have stayed a few more nights! It was so peaceful and cozy. Everything was very clean and the host was so friendly. The cottage was decorated with Christmas things and I loved it. Hot breakfast was served and it was delicious! Their dog Flo also greeted us the night we came in. She was so nice :) I definitely want to come back if we drive through the area again.

Kate's Cottage was exactly what I needed for a personal retreat. It was welcoming and cozy inside and a beautiful place to walk with lots of peace outside. Along with a beautiful place to stay, a warm breakfast each morning was above and beyond. Thank you, Gale, for your hospitality and sharing your cottage. I look forward to staying again soon.

There are not enough words to say how fabulous Gale’s cottage is. We were in the process of moving to a new home and stayed here on our way. We will be back! The peace and comfort provided allowed us to rest and recover. Oh , the scrumptious breakfast, wow what a treat. If you need peaceful relaxation, this is the place to stay! She allowed us to have our pets travel with us stress free. Our boys were so at ease, truly a blessing.

If your looking for a peaceful, cozy country home to rest after a long day traveling or to escape the hustle and bustle of life - Kate’s Cottage is your place. Well worth the short drive from the interstate.
The cottage is lovingly decorated with period pieces as well as seasonal items- that make you feel right at home. The finishing touch was the AMAZING breakfast delivered to the back door.
Gale truly is a Super host!

Gale was such a kind and gracious hostess! We arrived to a very welcoming atmosphere with personal touches. The breakfast was well presented and so very good! It was so relaxing being there! Grateful for her beautiful cottage! Look forward to visiting again!

Fantastic, Comfortable, Historic Cottage decorated with detail. The sunset on the farm was perfect and the grounds of which you can walk about feel like you are in a movie. There is an attic upstairs that is fully finished with an extra bed for an extra charge and totally worth it. Gale is super sweet and will make sure you have everything you need. Plenty of space for you to walk around with beautiful grounds. I would recommend this place for anyone who wants to avoid the burden of staying in the city and who wants a peaceful, comfortable and quiet stay.
Great place with a great host.
The cottage is picture -perfect! My husband and I absolutely loved our stay here. It was relaxing and rejuvenating and Gale went above and beyond as a host!
Kate's Cottage is a great place to stay. We are repeat visitors. We love the quiet country setting and Gale's hospitality.

Kate’s Cottage is a magical destination. Our oldest son attends USD, which is a 15-20 minute drive from the cottage. It’s the perfect place to stay while visiting your student! Gale’s attention to detail is unmatched and her breakfast is fantastic. We will continue to try to stay at the cottage when we visit our son.

The cottage is on a beautiful farm and is super easy to get into. The cottage is super cute and decorated for the season by Gale. Gale seems to have a sense of humor that made the stay sweet and fun. And to top it all off, she cooked us breakfast and left it at our door in the morning. It was delicious and so sweet.

The cottage was great and we loved the farm. The fact that it was pet friendly meant we could share our wonderful experience with our dog. He even got to “meet” the goats. My wife has dietary restrictions and Gale asked beforehand and adjusted the breakfast food to meet her needs. Overall an amazing experience.
Beautiful experience at Kate's Cottage & Gale was delightful!
Absolutely wonderful stay at Kate's cottage! Gale is a superb host that makes you feel right at home. you simply must stay if you're passing through!

Kate’s Cottage is fantastic! The cottage is amazingly cute, cozy and a joy to experience. The breakfast is beyond expectations. Gale has poured her love into this place and it shows. We could not have been more pleased. You will not be disappointed whether just passing through or staying a few days. It’s one of our top Airbnb experiences.

This is such a special place. It was an honor to be part of the history here, and the attention to hospitality is unmatched. I wish I lived near by so I could come visit on the regular! Thanks so much!
The ultimate escape!

My only true regret was not truly having enough time to enjoy this little slice of heaven. I recommend anyone staying spend a decent amount of time star gazing. The chickens are really friendly and sweet as is the cat! I was greeted by so much warmth. And I'm truly looking forward to staying here again in the near future!
A great overnight stay at Kate’s Cottage was all that it lived up to be in farm living. Loved the animals and so did our dog meeting her first chicken. Amazing place!

I wanted to treat my mom to a special getaway for her birthday, and this couldn't have been any more perfect. My mom is still talking about it! We loved every moment there. The cottage is so cozy and quaint, and the setting is absolutely beautiful. We enjoyed sitting on the front porch in the evening watching the full moon and again in the morning drinking coffee in our robes. It is just so peaceful there. In the morning, Gale delivered a delicious breakfast to our door too. Everything is done so thoughtfully. We will definitely be back to stay again and plan on bringing others to experience it too!
Definitely a great getaway location, Gale was awesome and very communicative! It's an adorable place.

Gale's listing is wonderful, as a host she's wonderful, very friendly, very welcoming. I was excited also to have the chance to meet Flo her dog.
Everything involving the host, the property and the experience of sharing a slice of life with Gale was wonderful. There was a big negative though, me.
I've stayed at many Airbnbs in the past, we almost always bring our dogs. Up until recently we've always traveled with our big popup kennel. A few months ago I decided that our dogs never showed any destructive traits so it was a waste of space in our tight little jeep setup. As we were leaving my girlfriend said "are you sure you don't want to bring the kennel" I said "nope, they're all good, we trust them".
In hindsight that was very dumb, but also against the rules. While not mentioned in Gale's house rules page in the description it does clearly state that dogs aren't to be left alone in the cottage unless in a kennel. I missed that completely. The first night was fine, the second day, wasn't. I'm guessing they were startled by something outside, what it was doesn't really matter but our pups (I think I know which one) damaged the blinds inside of the cottage. We got the call as we were heading into Sioux Falls, Gale reminded me of the kennel policy (again which I completely overlooked). She showed lenience on us though as she allowed them to stay in the mud room, which wasn't ideal for any of us but it was an option that excused me from finding another place to stay or a new kennel. Everything else went well and as far as I can say no other hitches. My own hubris caused a dark cloud over the trip though. Sometimes we need to stop, and listen to our partners and do a reality check. I won't forget this one. Thanks Gale, I hope we're able to stay with you again sometime, kennel in tow.

This stay was so much more than we could have imagined. The place was exactly what we needed! Quiet, comfortable great setting and the best place out Aussie could have hoped for. Gale was a super host and very welcoming.

What a charming and welcoming home! From the lovely farm setting to the homemade breakfast delivered to your door, this place is perfect! It is also very nice that Gale allows pets. The house was also equipped with everything you need - from good coffee to toiletries! Highly recommend!

Our stay at Kate’s cottage was the much needed little oasis in South Dakota that during our cross country road trip. We appreciated all of the little things that made our stay so comfortable— cookies waiting for us, breakfast in the morning, a welcome sign and notes, toiletries, etc. Rarely on AirBnb do you find a true BnB. Gale thought of it all. The price was great and the location was worth the extra drive to be on the most charming farm. Couldn’t recommend this stay enough— it’s a must go. The only thing that would have made this stay better was if we could have spent another night.
Wonderful place to stay! We have stayed here several times and love it. The cottage is beautiful and peaceful. Breakfast is amazing. Highly recommended!
Gale was the sweetest and most caring host. The breakfasts were fantastic, the cabin was clean and the perfect spot to relax!

Perfect embrace back into the midwest. The cottage is beyond tranquil--so much personality and warmth. The bed is bliss. The only Airbnb to date I've stayed where a full breakfast was brought to the door (in a picnic basket). The cottage stands out most of all due to Gale's gorgeous attention to everything--she's on site (though my quick stay didn't facilitate meeting her) and tends to every detail first-hand. The first thing I saw upon arrival was a sign hung on the front door welcoming me and my pup by name. I loved that the cottage is disconnected. (I did have an emergency phone call that I was able to take--two bars of cell service were strong in the cottage).

We loved our time at Kate's Cottage! From the amazing country views, to the comfy bed, to the friendly pets, to the delicious breakfast! If we ever pass through the area again, we definitely will stop by and stay! Gale left notes and information and made the stay very nice!

Folks, GO OUT OF YOUR WAY to stay here, but only if you love and value things like beauty, history, nature, and wholesomeness. If the idea of barn swallows and petunias with your morning coffee and frittata doesn't appeal to you, look elsewhere (but reconsider your life choices!)
just perfect

Everything was perfect, check in was smooth, everything was clean, bed was comfortable, and the history of the cottage was fascinating. Breakfast in the morning was the perfect way to start the day before a long drive west. We also loved meeting all the animals, Olive loved Flo and meeting the herd!

Lovely space! The cottage is decorated with a touch of yesterday and is perfect for unplugging from the outside world and refreshing your inner person. Gale was a wonderful communicator, and we loved greeting her four-legged friends every morning.

Looking for a great place to stretch out and relax after being cooped up in the car for many hours? That’s exactly what we found at Kate’s cottage!
Gale was very hospitable and accommodated our travel schedule buy adjusting her routine so we can still enjoy the breakfast with homemade baked goods. We will absolutely choose to stay here if we drive cross country again.
Flo is also the most adorable greeter there ever was.
Kate’s Cottage is a charming and cozy place on a lovely little farm. We greatly enjoyed our stay there, and Gale is a simply wonderful host. We loved her delicious breakfast, too!

500+ 5 star reviews should inspire confidence, I'll add mine anyway. The place is delightful, the breakfast was great... but it's knowing someone is doing all this when it's not necessary- but from a sense of (I'm guessing) pride of place, a love of a job well done, and care for others that is so restorative. Thank you Gale!

Last stop on our 3wk camping trip toward home….felt even better to crawl into a real bed, and know that in the morning someone special was going to leave breakfast at the door. That someone special is the host of this little gem! She sure knows how to appreciate her family’s heritage farm and share with others! From the greeting of her kitty and pup, to the soft lighting of the sun setting through the windows, the coolness of the a/c on a muggy night, to the thoughtfulness of Gale’s French toast sitting in the kitchen, it was all so perfect. This cottage is perfect. A lovely stopping point to rest and breathe in the beautiful surroundings. Thank you for that Gale. 🌸
We had a great time! Our 2nd visit!
A gorgeous place, delicious breakfast, a perfect place to stay.
Gale was a great hostess. We enjoyed the quiet and all the personal touches. A great gluten free breakfast, clean, cozy and comfortable. A great value. We will be back.

Echoing what other reviewers have said about this beautiful cabin. It was the perfect night’s respite for a cross-country road trip. Hospitable host & friendly animals - I would definitely stay here again!

Kate's Cottage is an extraordinary Airbnb experience! Hosts Gale and Galen truly have created a work-of-art 1930's style cottage, with the conveniences of running water, indoor plumbing and AC.
Safe, quiet, and delightful stay. We've added this to one of our top stays!

We love Kate’s Cottage so very much! Gale is simply the best host! She is so welcoming and hospitable. Our whole family loves the cottage, even our dog who got to go back to his roots and helped Gale herd the goats back into their pen! The kids love it and so do we. Also Gale is a great cook/baker, we enjoyed the breakfast and appreciated the gluten free accommodations! Thank you Gale!

This was the most unique and cute Airbnb!!
The cottage was super comfy and quiet. We were traveling with our 2 labs and they were able to roam the farm and check out the chickens and goats!
Gale greeted us upon arrival (and made some great recommendations for the rest of our road trip), but gave us free reign of the farm to explore (plenty of privacy). We also had fresh cookies in the kitchen upon arrival (yum)!
Gale quietly dropped breakfast off the next morning at the door (at the time we specified). It was the cutest setup but was also an AMAZING breakfast.
We only stayed one night, but this was the perfect stop on our long road trip. Beds were comfortable and we had all amenities needed; full kitchen with fridge and microwave, shower with toiletries, etc.
There is no tv, but we didn’t need it. Exploring the farm was fun and the cottage also has puzzles/cards if you are traveling with kids.
I would absolutely recommend Gale’s cottage and will be staying again when we road trip through there in the future!

Just stop looking and book this place...it really is that great. There isn't wifi or a tv, but for an unplugged, cozy stay you can't ask for anything better. The host (Gale) is amazing--she's kind and welcoming (and is super cool with letting you chill at her dining room table if you have to get on the internet). The goats and chickens are steps away, the area is incredibly quiet, and the space is incredibly comfortable. No fenced yard but I'd guess they'd be okay with off-leash pets if you asked (mine are runners so didn't try). Memory foam mattress that is medium firm, A/C worked on a pretty hot SD weekend. The fact that breakfast is included in your stay (and the breakfast is superb) is amazing. Definitely recommend, definitely would stay again.

This place was exactly what I was looking for. Remote, adorable, and away from everything where my dog and I could enjoy some solitude.
Gale was so communicative. The cottage was adorable. There were cookies upon arrival which was much appreciated after a long drive.
We explored the property and saw the goats and chickens. We took a walk down a dirt road. There is just acre upon acre of farmland. It’s breathtaking!!!
Breakfast in the morning was so nice and perfect before our journey back home. We had to get one more walk in before we left. There are barely any cars on the road.
What a beautiful place to relax and unwind away from all the nuisances of the world!
Highly recommend. I’ll definitely be back.
This place is a gem. Has everything you could need. Bed was super comfortable and breakfast was fantastic.

We felt so welcomed at this cottage! Gale is friendly and accomodating and the cottage is the perfect getaway. Our toddlers also felt right at home and enjoyed feeding the goats and meeting Flo the dog!

What a GEM! This cottage is so quaint, comfortable and relaxing. A lovely drive out, and a step back into a peaceful time. The kitchen is equipped with all you need to cook a meal. (Just add food) In the bedroom you’ll find a comfortable memory foam bed with crisp linens. Outdoors, the setting is so peaceful as you watch the goats play or have a visit from Flo. We had the pleasure of meeting Gale and enjoyed some great conversation. The best part, as many others have mentioned and definitely worth the stay is the true B-n-B experience Gale provides, a divine breakfast delivered hot and fresh at your door. If you’re in the area, do yourself a favor and stay.
Gale's cottage is so charming! She is an excellent host. We had a great stay on the most idyllic farm.

We are repeat visitors to Gale's and love staying there. The cottage is very clean, cute, and comfortable. Gale is a welcoming and inviting host. Her setting is picture perfect and her cottage is a wonderful place to stay. The breakfast is truly 5 star. It is by far the best breakfast we've ever had during any stay (including B&B's, etc.). We couldn't give this Airbnb a stronger recommendation - it is well worth the visit.

This cottage is wonderful! Not only is it quiet and comfortable, but Gale is an excellent host who was accommodating of my food allergens and thought ahead about my dogs’ needs. For others traveling with dogs, the Airbnb is on a hard road with little traffic so it’s easy to walk your dogs. I can’t recommend this Airbnb enough. If you’re looking to spend the night around Beresford, look no further!

Kate’s Cottage was absolutely wonderful and Gale the perfect host. The cottage itself is full of charm and history. It was comfortable and well supplied with everything we needed and wanted. Gale’s breakfast was delicious. We had a wonderful chat with Gale and took a few walks along the country roads accompanied by Flo, the friendly dog. It was relaxing, peaceful and a great place to stay.
BEST Airbnb I’ve ever stayed at. Everything was perfect from start to finish. Gale is a TRUE ‘super host’. Will definitely stay again and recommend to anyone I come into contact with! Well worth it!

What an amazing incredible gem! If I could give it 10 🌟 I would! I rally is a Bed and Breakfast Plus!!!! Gale is amazing and her fur and feather friends are precious! What a beautiful place to unplug from this not so nice world right now! Gales detail to her touches in the cottage make you feel like you are in a story book! Could not have been happier with our stay! Thank you Gale!♥️

Gale does absolutely fantastic at adding personal touches throughout the cottage to make it your home away from home. The animals even take you in as their own! We had such a great time unplugging and enjoying the space. There truly is so much rest and beauty to experience here. We look forward to being back and experiencing other seasons at the cottage!

Stop looking for a place to stay and book this place if you can. Gale is an A+ host who has created a little slice of heaven that can be yours for the night (or two or three or four…). The cottage has been lovingly restored to a charming sanctuary in the perfect setting to unplug, unwind, and recharge. We loved the peace, quiet, delicious homemade breakfast (and cookies!) and comfortable bed, while our 18-month-old son loved feeding the goats and chasing Flo (the friendliest pup ever). Truly a remarkable experience that we will always cherish. We’re already looking at dates to return!

We cannot say enough good things about Kate’s Cottage. Gale was an incredible host. Breakfast was absolutely amazing! It’s worth the money just for breakfast. It’s an easy drive in to Sioux Falls. It’s actually perfect to remove yourself from city life and relax on the peaceful farm. It felt secluded and comfortable. The cottage itself is cute and well kept. Communication was wonderful. The easiest 5 stars I’ve ever given.
Wow! Wow! Wow! This place was perfect the breakfast was perfect. We are traveling across the country and needed a home away from home. 10/10 recommend great for dogs! We loved it

This is an incredible little place to stay. A wonderful little 30s cottage on a farm. Super clean, homey, and the hosts are responsive and accommodating. The host made the best breakfast I've ever experienced at an air bnb. The place also has the nicest dog you will meet at an air bnb. The lack of TV and wifi is a nice break. Unplug and enjoy this wonderful little spot in southern SD.

This was the best stay of our entire cross country road trip! Gale was extremely sweet, making breakfast and having it delivered to the cottage warm for you whenever you request it! Feeding the goats on the farm was an awesome activity to do as well before heading out. Happy to be a part if the history of Kate’s Cottage!

Gale’s place is absolutely perfect. My sister and I stayed for only one night on our trip from Washington to Illinois, but we wish that we could have stayed longer. Gale is a wonderful human being and her existence gives me hope for humanity. The homemade breakfast that she made for us was phenomenal, and paired with toppings, fresh strawberries, and love. I can only hope to get the chance to stay here again sometime. If you have the chance, this is a MUST STAY! Thank you Gale for everything. We will think of you always!

To start my review of Kate’s Cottage, I will say that I’ve been trying to think of a good excuse to go back there, hopefully as soon as possible. We are on a cross-country drive from Washington State to Ohio, feeling grateful for the opportunity to have stayed in Gale’s beautifully restored farm cottage as we made our way through South Dakota. Gale is the best of hosts – so friendly and helpful. We had a blissfully quiet night’s sleep and a delicious breakfast. The farm itself is a piece of history. Also in the area is an historic church (the pastor gave us a tour). Although Kate’s Cottage is out along a rural road, it is quite close to Beresford (excellent grocery store, Fiesta Foods), and not far from Vermillion. As I said, we’re hoping to find our way back there!

Gale is the greatest Airbnb host I have ever interacted with and Kate's Cottage is a little slice of Heaven. Upon arrival, I was greeted by the friendly farm dog, Flo, and a plate of homemade chocolate chip cookies and banana bread! Each morning, Gale delivered freshly-prepared breakfasts and even took my dietary restriction into consideration. The cottage itself was perfectly decorated and cleaned spotless. Not only that, but Gale was quick to communicate and very accommodating of our needs. If I could move-in to Kate's Cottage, I absolutely would!

This was one of our favorite Air B&Bs, ever! From the quaint and comfortable cottage, to the sweet animals, to the delicious breakfast, we can't rate this highly enough. We would highly recommend this cottage to anyone passing through the area. Thank you so much for the fantastic hospitality!!
The stay at the cottage was absolutely perfect. Beautiful touches throughout made it feel like home away from home. Breakfast was amazing and Gale was a fantastic host!

Loved my stay at Kates Cottage. I’m current on a road trip with my dogs and the quiet nature of the cottage was everything we were looking for.
The little decorative touches that Gale did for Easter were so special. She asked about dietary preferences and was very accommodating. Breakfast was absolutely delicious. I would high recommend staying here
This home is charming, clean, and comfortable. The breakfast is also delicious. For a comparable price, this is so much better than a hotel!
Just what we needed.
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Kate's Cottage. From Flo the dog greeting us to the cozy comfort, to the unplugged quiet, to the delicious breakfasts--it was all perfect!

Cozy, quiet, and quaint. Kate’s Cottage is delightful if you’re looking to unplug and get away from it all. Gale and Flo were enthusiastic and gracious hostesses. The goats and chickens were more aloof and only mildly curious of us. Alas, we didn’t see Jack. The cottage is well-stocked and had so many historical, family, and personal touches from the furnishings to the pictures and even the deeds on the wall and the books in the book basket. The yummy welcome cookies were appreciated as was the hot, delivered right to your door with all of the fixings, breakfast. We wished that we could have stayed for several more days.

We really enjoyed our time at the cottage thanks to Gale! This cute little place is tucked away where there’s a stillness and simplicity you didn’t know you needed until you’ve experienced it. Communication and check-in was great and our unique needs were accommodated. Gale’s thoughtfulness really makes the stay a wonderful experience! Books for my little girl, pastries I had trouble sharing with the family, and let me emphasize a well-rounded breakfast in the morning to your liking! Seriously can’t rave enough. If you are passing through the area or just looking to get away for a bit, you won’t regret staying here. Thanks again!

This was the perfect get-away location! It was single digits when we visited but the home was nice and toasty. The snacks and breakfast that Gale brought made us feel like we were very loved and welcomed. It truly felt like home, and I hope you have the same experience too. Don't forget to check out the local towns for coffee and shopping!
If you have the chance to stay here DO IT! This is an absolute gem! So clean and beautifully decorated. It has everything you could need. Gale makes the best breakfast ever!

We chose Kate’s Cottage as the location for our wedding anniversary for many reasons and they all proved to be true and good. First, we wanted to “get away from it all.” The cottage is on an old farmstead in a rural area typical of what one would imagine South Dakota to be like, a cluster of buildings surrounded by a windbreak in a sea of acres and acres of farmland. Coyotes were howling at sundown on our first night and then the most wonderful quiet ever came with the darkness. There was a CD player with a little selection of music and we played the flute CD and had a glass of wine while relaxing and talking in a most comfortable living room. Sleep was undisturbed and the bed very comfortable. Breakfast brought to our door (the second reason we chose this location) was the best treat of all! Gale asked about dietary preferences and fashioned two lovely and very hearty breakfasts for us that filled us so much that we didn’t even need to eat lunch! We picked up a yummy Casey’s pizza the first night and brought our own food to be microwaved on the second night since we knew the weather was not going to be the best. The third reason we chose the cottage was because we wanted to bring our two little terriers with us. They just loved their little walks around the farm and snoozing near us in the warm cottage. We chose to visit a friend 35 minutes away in Sioux Falls for our outing on Saturday, but considered hiking in local state parks or visiting Vermillion. The quaintness of the cabin provided a setting that was super comfortable and private for a lovely weekend for us! Thanks, Gale, for being such a great host!

Wow! This place is a gem. I was on road-trip with my dogs and the cottage provided the perfect spot to rest and relax. Gale makes everything feel so cozy and inviting. The breakfast in the morning was delicious! We had the best time and can't wait to stay again!

A lovely cottage on the prairie.
Rich with history and finding new life as a peaceful resting place in this face paced world.

If you love animals, vintage homes, delicious breakfasts, and are wanting to unplug and escape into another world, this is the place. We were greeted by a very friendly cat and dog, and enjoyed the goats and chickens nearby. Easy to find location, beautiful farm, and a comfortable little home! Thanks!
We continue to love staying at this adorable cottage! Breakfast is amazing! We will always stay here whenever we are in the area!

Kates Cottage was the perfect stay to unwind, relax and enjoy South Dakota’s beauty! The barn and goats were fun to see and Gale let us feed them with her! Jack the cat and Flo are amazing little pets and we greatly enjoyed them! I woke up early and saw the sunrise above the barn and it was breathtaking. We slept amazing and enjoyed every ounce of this sweet retreat!! Definitely want to come back!!!

Loved our stay at Kates cottage. It was a home away from home. The lovely cottage was super clean, quiet and well-appointed. Breakfast was hot and delicious. A wonderful respite to break up a long drive. Loved reading about the history of the renovation.
Was such a cute place and makes a yummy breakfast too.

Such a wonderful place. Was so happy staying at the cottage I did not want to leave. Gale makes everything so special.
And all the sweet animals that visit make it feel extra special!
Thanks so much Gale!
Everything was more than perfect!

My only suggestion would be to make sure you use the bug spray at night when going out. And you'll want to go out at night and see the expansive starry sky and LIGHTNING BUGS and hear the whippoorwills!
